text: Customize the wallpaper – payever Skip to main content Sign in Sign in payever payever Settings Getting Started Customize the wallpaper 13 days ago Updated When you register your account at payever you will automatically be assigned a dashboard image (wallpaper) that is suitable, based on the industry you specified. If you don't like the background, feel free to choose another picture from our gallery or upload your own. To do this, open the Settings app on your dashboard and select the Wallpaper button in the navigation on the left of your screen. Here you can either upload your own image under My Wallpapers or select one of our existing images from the Industry tab. To upload your own image under My Wallpapers, please click on the + sign (make sure that the picture you upload has sufficient resolution and that the picture is not too bright as this can impair the readability of the page) and upload a desired wallpaper. Afterwards please select the desired wallpaper you want to have displayed on your dashboard (no matter if it will be your own upload or a selected picture from industry tab) by clicking on the three blue dots and selecting Set . Your chosen wallpaper should now be displayed on your dashboard. A further option to customise the background of the dashboard is to select the desired Appearance . There are three available options (Dark, Transparent and Light). Once selected, it will be displayed accordingly on your dashboard. Was this article helpful? text: Einzelne Apps ausblenden – payever Zum Hauptinhalt gehen Anmelden Anmelden payever payever Account Erste Schritte Einzelne Apps ausblenden vor 3 Monaten Aktualisiert Falls Sie nur einzelne Apps unserer Plattform nutzen und die übrigen Apps auf Ihrem Dashboard als störend empfinden, können Sie gerne nicht benötigte Apps ausblenden . Bitte beachten Sie dabei , dass das Ausblenden der Widgets (die großen Kacheln auf dem Homescreen) keinen direkten Einfluss auf die Funktionalität von payever hat. Sollten jedoch einzelne Apps entfernt und somit deinstalliert werden, kann dies einen Einfluss auf die Funktionalität von payever haben . Es sollten daher nur Apps deinstalliert werden, die nicht benötigt werden (die meisten Händler:innen müssen mindestens die Apps Checkout, Transactions, Connect und Settings installiert haben, um die Kernfunktionalitäten von payever nutzen zu können). Falls Sie bestimmte Apps nur für bestimmte Mitarbeitende ausblenden möchten, können Sie dies in der Mitarbeiterverwaltung tun. Um bestimmte Apps/Widgets zu deaktivieren, klicken Sie auf Bearbeiten in der Box mit der App-Übersicht: Nun entfernen Sie die nicht benötigten Apps vom Dashboard, indem Sie auf die im unteren Screenshot grün markierten Flächen klicken. Über dieses Fenster können Sie auch jederzeit Apps wieder hinzufügen, falls Sie sich umentschieden haben oder eine App versehentlich entfernt haben: War dieser Beitrag hilfreich? text: Configure shipping options  – payever Skip to main content Sign in Sign in payever payever Connect Getting Started Configure shipping options 1 year ago Updated Give your customers the option to choose from three different shipping options or just select the shipping provider you trust. In your online store, you have the flexibility to offer one or more shipping options to send your shipments to your customers. You can also have your shipping labels created through this option and ship the packages by yourself. With Hermes , DHL and UPS shipping service providers, you have easy, fast, secure and cost-effective options to ship the orders to your customers. First, go to our Connect app . To do this, you need to click on the cross icon "Connect" on your dashboard or press open at the bottom of the tab under "Connect". You will now see the overview of Shipping in the left navigation bar. Now you can choose between the three different shipping options and install them. Selecet all or only one of the shipping options that fit your needs and online store. Click install and in a few seconds you will have access to the app. Now you can access the app. You can enter your data such as username, password or EKP directly via the payever-app. Now you can connect your account with your shipping provider to the payever-app. If you no longer need one of the apps for shipping options, you can easily uninstall it and install it again whenever you need to. You can find more information about shipping here: Setting up payever shipping Was this article helpful? text: Configure social media  – payever Skip to main content Sign in Sign in payever payever Connect Getting Started Configure social media 1 year ago Updated In this article you will learn how and which social media apps you can install. You have the choice of six different social media apps that let you reach your customers in a variety of ways. Pinterest lets you "pin" your products and content, which allows you to reach many potential customers and draw attention to your products. YouTube gives you the opportunity to share marketing and promotional videos to reach out directly to your customers. Twitter and Facebook allow you to plan, schedule and organize your upcoming posts to reach a large number of potential customers. Connect with your customers, network, and share business-related posts and content via LinkedIn . Instagram , on the other hand, gives you the platform to post videos and photos, interact with your customers, and reach new audiences. First, go to our Connect app . To do this, you need to click on the cross icon "Connect" on your dashboard or press open at the bottom of the tab under "Connect". You will now see the Social overview in the left navigation. Now you can choose between the six different social media apps and install them. When you have installed the apps a window will open confirming that you are now connected to the app. Here you can Open the website directly from the payever app. With a click on the app, it opens and you have the option to Connect it. As soon as you click on Connect, you will be redirected to the Pinterest page , for example, where you can log in with your data as usual. If you no longer need one of the apps, you can easily uninstall it via the pop-up window. If you need it, you can install it again at any time. Was this article helpful?
